--- title: General description: --- export const startTag = '
{%-'

export const endTag = '-%}
' WIP Generic Triggers Control Flow Tag Iteration Tag Variable Tag Theme Tag ## Generic Triggers | Prefix | Method | | ---------: | --------------------------------- | | `tag→` | {% %} | | `comment→` | {%- comment -%}{%- endcomment -%} | | `raw→` | {% raw %}{% endraw %} | ## Control Flow Tag | Prefix | Method | | --------: | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | `if` | {% if condition %} ... {% endif %} | | `else` | {% else %} | | `elseif` | {% elseif condition %} | | `ifelse` | {% if condition %} ... {% else %} ... {% endif %} | | `unless` | {% unless condition %} ... {% endunless %} | | `case` | {% case variable %} ... {% when condition %} ... {% else %} ... {% endcase %} | | `when` | {% when condition %} | | `if-` | {%- if condition -%} ... {%- endif -%} | | `else-` | {%- else -%} | | `elseif-` | {%- elseif condition -%} | | `ifelse-` | {%- if condition -%} ... {%- else -%} ... {%- endif -%} | | `unless-` | {%- unless condition -%} ... {%- endunless -%} | | `case-` | {%- case variable -%} ... {%- when condition -%} ... {%- else -%} ... {%- endcase -%} | | `when-` | {%- when condition -%} | ## Iteration Tag | Prefix | Method | | ------------: | --------------------------------- | | `cycle` | {% cycle 'odd', 'even' %} | | `cyclegroup` | {% cycle 'group name': 'odd', 'even' %} | | `for` | {% for item in collection %} … {% endfor %} | | `break` | {% break %} | | `continue` | {% continue %} | | `cycle-` | {%- cycle 'odd', 'even' -%} | | `cyclegroup-` | {%- cycle 'group name': 'odd', 'even' -%} | | `for-` | {%- for item in collection -%} … {%- endfor -%} | | `continue-` | {%- continue -%} | ## Variable Tag
Prefix Method
`assign` ``` {%- assign variable = value -%} ```
`assignNow` ``` {%- assign now = 'Now' | Date -%} ```
`assignAttribute` ``` {%- assign variable = Item | Attribute:'variable' -%} ```
`assignPageParameter` ``` {%- assign variable = PageParameter.value -%} ```
`increment` ``` {%- assign count = count | Plus:1 -%} ```
`decrement` ``` {%- assign count = count | Minus:1 -%} ```
`capture` ``` {% capture variable %} ... {% endcapture %} ```
`capture-` ``` {%- capture variable -%} ... {%- endcapture -%} ```
## Theme Tag | Prefix | Method | | ------------: | ----------------------------------------- | | `include` | {%- include ’~~/Assets/Lava/CURRENT_FILE_NAME’ -%} | | `includewith` | {% include ‘snippet’, variable:value %} | | `raw` | {% raw %}{% endraw %} | | | |
